item.title: svenvc/NeoCSV
item.description: NeoCSV is an elegant and efficient standalone Smalltalk framework to read and write CSV converting to or from Smalltalk objects.

item.title: svenvc/zinc
item.description: Zinc HTTP Components is an open-source Smalltalk framework to deal with the HTTP networking protocol.
